## What is it

[StorySurvey](https://causalmap.shinyapps.io/StorySurvey2/) is a simple text-based web app for gathering causal stories (“what led to / might lead to / could have led to / what”): a qualitative survey tool. It is suitable for use on internet-connected phones and tablets by individuals or groups. 


StorySurvey is designed to be:

- Quick and easy to set up
- Quick and easy to answer
- Quick and easy to analyse


## Why StorySurvey

- Build a collective theory of change for an evaluation
- Explore future scenarios
- Social research

## Who?

StorySurvey is provided by [Causal Map Ltd](http://causalmap.app).
